symbol.description: The symbolic representation of the chord (e.g., Cmaj7, Dm).

beats.description: Duration of the chord in beats.

roman.description: Optional: Roman numeral analysis of the chord.

notes.description: Optional: Specific notes making up the chord (e.g., for detected chords).

quality.description: Optional: Detected or specified chord quality (e.g., major, minor, dominant, diminished).
